channel.title: Have Everything, Need Help Getting Online With PVPscape - creating a rule
channel.description:
I have the PVPscape source, everything with the server itself is a-ok. I just need assistance creating a rule into my router, i use sbcglobal wireless internet, please don't just tell me to go to the ultimate server guide, i've read it, not helping. All that does is tell me to type in my ip-adress. 1st off - where am i supposed to type it?...the url i know, anyone can draw this from common sense. So i go into my iternet setting and find my ip-adress, type it into the url, and what do i get? A page cannot be found message, you know one of those really annoying white screens with a bunch of white text? If anyone can go into greater detail and help me get my server online, there is an admin position on my "hopefully soon to be up" server.
Thanks

item.title: Have Everything, Need Help Getting Online With PVPscape - creating a rule
item.dc:creator: @Le_Hawtz Le Hawtz
item.description:
@Le_Hawtz wrote:

agreed, well keep on this thread maybe you’ll get an answer, add imthat_onedude@hotmail.com if you have one, once i have mine i’ll try to help[br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2007, 11:08:43 AM[/size][hr]i have, and i’m not talking about the router i’m talking about trying to create a rule under “advanced - gaming” or something like that, where you type in the name and whatnot, if anyone knows please post[br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2007, 11:09:56 AM[/size][hr]cmon people…[br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2007, 11:21:16 AM[/size][hr]ffs i need help[br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2007, 11:26:14 AM[/size][hr]heeeeeeeeeeeeeelp meeeeeeeeeeeeeee[br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2007, 11:27:26 AM[/size][hr]ffs quit viewing and POsT![br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2007, 11:31:43 AM[/size][hr]HELP…ME…PLEASE

Read full topic

make sure to open port 43594 on oyur router rule.
